name: Visual Karsys
description: Visual KARSYS is a software platform for karst groundwater management, providing tools to assess aquifer geometries and flow systems. It supports scientists, engineers, and stakeholders in addressing groundwater exploitation, civil engineering, geothermal projects, natural hazards, and waste management in karst environments.

name: Schweizer Dialektsammlung
description: The Swiss Dialect Collection is a national research project by ZHAW and FHNW for collecting local dialect recordings. The public can now help by creating voice recordings with a simple app. The digitized dialects can train crucial computer programs. I mainly worked on the app's frontend.

name: Studenthub
description: Studenthub, which I developed from scratch, was initially tailored for FHNW's Data Science program to help track student progress and facilitate course selection. As it evolved to meet broader needs within FHNW HT, it now offers detailed graphical overviews of courses, grades, and program structures, with future plans to enhance course planning features.
